scripts.dev: docker compose down && docker compose up
scripts.dev:api: bun --bun run dev:api:down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.api.yml up
scripts.dev:web: bun --bun run dev:web:down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.web.yml up
scripts.dev:api:build: bun --bun run dev:api:down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.api.yml up --build
scripts.dev:web:build: bun --bun run dev:web:down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.web.yml up --build
scripts.dev:api:new: bun --bun run dev:api:down:volumes && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.api.yml up --build
scripts.dev:web:new: bun --bun run dev:web:down:volumes && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.web.yml up --build
scripts.start: docker compose -f ./docker-compose.prod.yml down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.prod.yml up --build
scripts.test:coverage: turbo test:coverage && bun run coverage:merge && bun run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:merge: rimraf coverage && node scripts/collect-coverage.js && nyc merge coverage/raw coverage/coverage-final.json
scripts.coverage:report: mkdir -p coverage && nyc report --temp-dir coverage --report-dir coverage/report --reporter=html --reporter=text --reporter=lcov && echo "\nðŸ“Š Merged coverage report generated at: coverage/report/index.html"
scripts.prod: bun --bun run prod:down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.prod.yml up --build
scripts.prod:new: bun --bun run prod:down:volumes && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.prod.yml up --build
scripts.prod:api: bun --bun run prod:api:down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.api.prod.yml up
scripts.prod:api:build: bun run prod:api:down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.api.prod.yml up --build
scripts.prod:api:new: bun --bun run prod:api:down:volumes && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.api.prod.yml up --build
scripts.prod:web: bun --bun run prod:web:down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.web.prod.yml up
scripts.prod:web:build: bun --bun run prod:web:down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.web.prod.yml up --build
scripts.prod:web:new: bun --bun run prod:web:down:volumes && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.web.prod.yml up --build
